entry.data:
CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

RAIN WITH FREEZING RAIN LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
ICE ACCUMULATION AROUND A TRACE
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN LIKELY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 17
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING EAST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

RAIN
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN SNOW LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS AROUND 30

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF SNOW 40 PERCENT
